articles.author: Dave Lawler
articles.title: Global poll: World sees Trump as "dangerous," "arrogant" and "strong" - Axios
articles.description: Trump is especially unpopular in Mexico, Canada and Europe.
articles.content:
• That's perhaps no surprise given Trump's tariffs, threats to annex Canada, and more skeptical approach to aiding Ukraine.

articles.author: Denise Chow
articles.title: European probe snaps first images of the sun's south pole - NBC News
articles.description: The first-ever images of the sun’s south pole reveal a messy jumble of magnetic activity in a never-before-seen region of our nearest star
articles.content: From the spacecrafts observations, scientists discovered that magnetic fields with both north and south polarity are currently present at the suns south pole. This mishmash of magnetism is expected t… [+1982 chars]
